Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows Andriel Santana to be eligible to take the civil service exam for the position of Columbia county deputy sheriff
Summary: Allows Andriel Santana to be eligible to take the civil service exam for the position of Columbia county deputy sheriff.
ActClause: AN ACT to allow Andriel Santana to be eligible to take the civil service exam for the position of deputy sheriff for the Columbia County Sheriff's Office
